entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning in the morning then changing to rain or drizzle in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:43 AM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
